shortDescription: An arbitrary code execution which results in privilege escalation was discovered in Helix Core versions prior to 2023.2.  Reported by Jason Geffner.
vulnerabilityName: perforce helix_core Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
